div.style: background-color: #BEE2F6; text-align:center; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; border-radius: 6px; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; border-color: #b0880033; color: #24292e;

p.a: We are excited to announce LocalStack 1.3, with new enhancements, community features and additions for our licensed users!
